name: INSearchForPhotosIntent
desc: A request for the list of photos that match the specified criteria.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: init(dateCreated: INDateComponentsRange?, locationCreated: CLPlacemark?, albumName: String?, searchTerms: [String]?, includedAttributes: INPhotoAttributeOptions, excludedAttributes: INPhotoAttributeOptions, peopleInPhoto: [INPerson]?)
items.desc: Initializes a search for photos intent object with the specified search parameters.

items.name: var peopleInPhoto: [INPerson]?
items.desc: The people identified in the photos.

items.name: var peopleInPhotoOperator: INConditionalOperator
items.desc: The operator that defines how to search for people in the photos.

items.name: var searchTerms: [String]?
items.desc: An array of terms to look for in the photos.

items.name: var searchTermsOperator: INConditionalOperator
items.desc: The operator that defines how to incorporate the search terms when performing the search.

items.name: var dateCreated: INDateComponentsRange?
items.desc: The range of dates during which someone took the pictures.

items.name: var locationCreated: CLPlacemark?
items.desc: The location where someone took the photos.

items.name: var albumName: String?
items.desc: The name of the album that contains the photos.

items.name: var includedAttributes: INPhotoAttributeOptions
items.desc: The attributes that must be present in the photos.

items.name: var excludedAttributes: INPhotoAttributeOptions
items.desc: The attributes that must not be present in the photos.

items.name: struct INPhotoAttributeOptions
items.desc: Constants indicating attributes of a photo.
